name: Outdoor crag "Gschöss"
description:
Info:

audience: beginners and advanced

difficulty: from 4 to 8

routes: 25

route length: 2 hours

rope length: up to 30 m

acces:

aproxx. 10 minutes walking distance from the top station of the Penkenb cable car, heading for Gschösswandhaus, further on to stanchion II, outside of the fence on a narrow trail to the sectors I, II and III (accessible by roping down 20m, on the right side of the stanchion).
